11.content:
*This story takes place just after Carla and Turk left for their honeymoon (the events of which you can read about in the Turk storyline), with one slight difference. In this story, J.D didn't break up at the rehearsal dinner, and instead are enjoying a 'growing' relationship.*

J.D and Elliot were in a cab on the way back to Elliot's place after Turk and Carla's wedding reception. J.D leaned back in the chair, popping the button on his tuxedo trousers.

"Whoof," he sighed, "I think I overdid it at that buffet."

Elliot smiled and snuggled up next to him, patting his small belly, "I think it's kinda cute."

They began to make out, and only stopped when the cab driver cleared his throat and informed them
that they had arrived at their destination.

Throwing a few crumpled bills at the driver, the lovestruck pair stumbled up to Elliot's apartment, a small but well furnished one bedroomed flat, with an ensuite bathroom and full kitchen.

While Elliot freshened up, J.D stripped out of his suit and lay on the bed in his boxers. He prodded his bloated belly and made a mental note to watch what he ate. Despite what she had said, he doubted Elliot would appreciate if he porked up.

All thoughts of weight gain were knocked from his mind by the reappearance of Elliot, wearing a lacy black thong... and nothing else.

The next morning, J.D woke up and found...
11.title: JD

choices: ... J.D meets Elliot for lunch.
...J.D finds he just can't stop eating!
112.content:
J.D woke up the next morning to the sound and smell of frying bacon. Despite only being dressed in his black boxer shorts, he made his way out to the kitchen and was surprised to find Elliot standing at the stove, cooking up a packet of bacon.

"Morning J.D." she said perkily. She was fully dressed, and had clearly been up for a while. J.D sat down at the table, which was already loaded with pancakes, sausages and scrambled eggs, as well as some hash browns and a pitcher of orange juice.

"Did you cook all of this?" he asked in disbelief.

"Of course," she replied, sliding the cooked bacon on to a plate, "why do you ask?"

"I don't know, I just never really thought of you as 'domestic'."

"Our maid used to teach me how to cook on Saturday mornings, during my parents' passive-aggressive squash match." Elliot explained as she carried the bacon over to the table, "She taught me so much... Until my mother fired her for 'enabling my trip to tubby town'."

J.D stifled a laugh at his girlfriend's dysfunctional homelife, and instead raised an eyebrow at the sheer amount of food. "Why did you cook so much?"

Elliot shrugged, "I dunno, you don't have to eat it all..."

J.D reached for a plate, but Elliot stopped him.

"Wait!"

She handed him a bright green pill and a small glass of water.

"What's this for?" he asked, confused.

"It's just a vitamin pill." she explained, sitting down, "You're supposed to take it with meals."

J.D shrugged and gulped down the pill. Almost immediately he felt a powerful hunger, and began loading up his plate with big piles of eggs, bacon and potatoes. Elliot smiled and pushed a stack of buttery pancakes towards him.

***

Half an hour later, and J.D sat back, completely stuffed. He had eaten almost everything on the table, as well as the entire jug of OJ, and it showed. His belly bulged out over his pants, rigid with food.

"Oogh," he groaned, before letting out a burp, "I am so full..."

"Mm-hm."

He looked up at Elliot, who was smiling at him over a mug of coffee.

"Hey," he said, looking at her clean plate, "didn't you have any?"

Elliot stood up, fanning a napkin to his greasy lips.

"Nah, I'm not really a big breakfast person."

"But..."

"Shouldn't you go get ready for work?"

"Oh my God!" exclaimed J.D, looking at the clock. Moving as fast as his stuffed belly would let him, he got dressed and left for work, leaving a happy Elliot to clean up the dishes.

Later on...
112.title: ...that Elliot had prepared a large breakfast.

choices: ...back to his place. He's tired of making a pig of himself in front of Elliot.
...out to dinner with Elliot.
1121.content:
J.D drove to work in his and Turk's 'vintage' car, moaning and burping all the while, trying to make his bloated belly go down.

"Why did I eat so much?" he thought, pulling his car into the parking lot, "Elliot must think I'm a complete pig!"

This last thought set off an elaborate fantasy where Elliot, dressed as a farmer, filled a trough with food for a hugely obese J.D, who when he bent down to eat, had a curly tail poking out from his trousers.

By the time he shook himself back to reality, he had somehow made it to the locker room. Checking to see that no one was around, he changed into a large pair of blue scrubs, and even put on his lab coat, trying to hide his small gut.

J.D soon forgot about his overeating, as he began his normal day of work. Visiting patients, making diagnoses, annoying Dr. Cox, avoiding the Janitor... It was just another routine day at Sacred Heart.

In fact the first time he broke routine was at lunchtime. Normally he would have lunch with Turk, but since he was away, J.D had arranged to meet Elliot.

"Stupid Carla," he grumbled, "Insisting they go on honeymoon 'alone'."

He indulged in a brief fantasy, where Turk and Carla were sitting on the beach, bored without their best friend J.D there.

He walked into the cafeteria to find Elliot already there, sitting next to the window eating a salad. He kissed her on the cheek and told her he was just going to get his food.

"No need." Elliot replied, "I already got you some."

She gestured at the tray opposite her, which was absolutely loaded with food. There were two huge cheeseburgers, sitting in a sea of french fries, onion rings and potato chips, as well as a large bottle of soda.

J.D was staggered by the amount of food, but didn't want to seem rude.

"Uh, thanks." he replied sitting down.

"Well, I know you like cheeseburgers, so..." Elliot shrugged, sensing his confusion.

He stared at his plate, not really sure where to begin. He was still pretty full from breakfast.

"Oh, wait." said Elliot, sliding over a napkin from her side of the table, followed by a bottle of water. Right in the center of the napkin was another little green pill.

"Again?"

"It's like, a two-a-day vitamin?" Elliot explained, "Twice as many vitamins as the one-a-day kind."

J.D knocked back the pill with a swig of water, and almost immediately found his appetite returning. He grabbed a burger and took an impressive bite, followed by another, and another. In no time at all he demolished the burger, before starting on the sides, grabbing an indiscriminate handful and cramming it in his mouth. He was lucky it was a slow time for the cafeteria, so no one was there to witness his gluttonous display, aside from Elliot, who didn't seem to mind.

He tore into the second burger, dripping ketchup right down his top. As he finished off the sides and chugged the soda, Elliot went to get dessert, apple pie with whipped cream. She gave him the larger slice, and quickly declared herself full after one tiny bite of hers, which she then fed to the seemingly insatiable J.D.

In fact it took two slices of the other dessert option (a creamy chocolate cake) before J.D sat back, finally full. His stomach was huge, even bigger than at breakfast, poking out from under his stained top. He groaned as Elliot popped the final crumb of cake in his mouth, before she kissed him on the forehead and told him she had to go.

He sat there for ten minutes, unable to move. He only struggled to his feet when his pager went off, reminding him he was at work.

Later that evening, J.D decides to go...
1121.title: Lunching and Munching

choices: Despite his best intentions, J.D gives into temptation.
J.D is surprised to find someone else already inside the apartment.
11211.content:
That afternoon, J.D passed as much work as he could off on his interns before retiring to the on-call room, where he planned to sleep off his massive meal. Finding the quietest corner he could, he slipped beneath the sheets and massaged his bloated belly until he fell asleep.

When he woke up a few hours later he was surprised to find Elliot sitting at the end of the bed, with two cups of coffee and a bag of donuts.

"Well good morning sleepyhead!" she said cheerily, as J.D sat up, feeling groggy. 

"I brought you a little snack." she continued, handing him a coffee and shaking the bag.

He sipped his coffee and began to make excuses, "Thanks, Elliot but...", but it felt like the caffeine had awoken his appetite as well as perking him up.

He reached into the bag and grabbed a pastry, covered in thick pink frosting. He took a large bite, and as the jelly dripped down his chin Elliot couldn't help but smile. 

"So, what do you want to do tonight?" Elliot asked, as J.D took a second donut from the bag.

"Um..." J.D hesitated. He was embarrassed about pigging out in front of Elliot, but he couldn't seem to help it when she was around.  Still, he didn't want to hurt her feelings.

"Um... What?" 

"Well... I thought I'd just hang out at home tonight." he said finally.

"Oh... Cool." Elliot replied.

Relieved, J.D took a third donut before offering the bag to Elliot. She smiled and declined.

"No thanks, I can't eat carbs after five."

J.D shrugged and finished off the remaining donuts himself. When he had licked the last crumb from his fingers Elliot leaned over and planted a kiss on his sugar stained lips.

He pulled her closer and they began to make out. As they fell back on to the bed, J.D slipped his hands down on to Elliot's butt, and was surprised to find her hands rubbing his swollen belly. Before he could really consider this, however, Elliot's pager went off and she had to dash out, leaving him confused and alone. 

"What was that?" he wondered, "She must have been trying to feel how big it was. I have kind of been overdoing it lately."

He lifted up his shirt and took a look for himself. It had gone down since lunch, but it was still fairly noticeable. He poked it, feeling the rigidness from the food, although there was a slight layer of flab.

Suddenly his watch beeped, informing him his shift was over and, finally he could go home. 

***

J.D's drive home was fairly uneventful. He'd been tempted to stop at a drive-thru, as the donuts hadn't quite filled him up, but one look down at his straining pants buttons convinced him it wasn't a good idea. By the time he got back to the apartment he shared with Carla and Turk, it was a little after seven o'clock. With his friends away on their honeymoon, he was looking forward to having the place to himself.
11211.title: Dozings and Donuts

choices: ...J.D decides to go for a jog.
...J.D and Elliot go shopping.
112112.content:
J.D unlocked the door and went inside, slamming it behind him with a groan.

"Finally, I'm home." he thought, immediately reaching for his waistband and undoing his fly, before taking a deep breath and feeling his gut surge forward.

"Ahh..." he sighed, patting his belly, "That's much better."

"What is?" 

Surprised, J.D let out a girlish squeal and fell to the floor. Calming down, he looked up to see a bemused Elliot staring at him from the couch, a magazine in her hands.

"What's much better?" she asked again.

"Oh, you know," J.D replied, standing up, "The floor. It's much better. Than other floors. It's, uh, sturdy."

Elliot snorted derisively and turned back to her magazine.

"So," J.D began, self-consciously pulling his shirt down over his stomach and his open pants, "So, uh, what are you doing here?" he asked, trying to sound casual.

Elliot didn't even look up from the article she was reading.

"You said you just wanted to hang out here tonight." she explained.

J.D was stuck. He had meant he wanted to hang out alone, but it wasn't like he could just kick her out.

"Cool." he said, finally. "I'll just, uh, go get changed." 

"Mm-hm." Elliot murmured, as he made for his bedroom.

***

J.D threw his clothes into the laundry hamper and grabbed a t-shirt from his dresser, along with some trousers. He was just pulling on some fresh socks when he heard the door opening, and then closing a few seconds later.

"Who was that?" he asked, half-hoping Elliot might have left suddenly.

"Just the pizza guy!" Elliot replied. 

J.D frowned. He had been planning on skipping dinner, maybe going for a jog. On the other hand, pizza sounded pretty good right now.

"Coming!" he called, hurrying out."

***

Elliot and J.D sat down in front of the T.V with their pizza. J.D had a beer from the fridge while Elliot was drinking diet soda. It was fairly large pizza, a little greasy, but with plenty of cheese, topped with ham and mushroom, J.D's favorite.

They found some Brady Bunch re-runs and ate in relative silence, laughing at the corny jokes. J.D carefully limited himself, only eating as much as Elliot ate, so he was disappointed when she stopped eating after two slices. He frowned and leaned back.

"It's probably for the best." he thought, glancing at his small potbelly.

A few minutes passed. "Are you finished?" Elliot asked, realizing he hadn't taken another slice.

"Uh, yeah." J.D replied, "I'm kinda full."

Elliot snorted, "Don't be such a wimp! I've seen you finish an entire pizza by yourself."

"But I..." he began, but Elliot interrupted.

"Come on." she said, handing him a slice, "Waste not, want not."

"I just..."

"Okay," she smiled, sensing his hesitance, "how about for every slice you eat... I'll remove an item of clothing?"

That caught his attention. He looked at her to see if she was serious. She smiled and nodded.

"You know," he said, as he held the slice, "I have already eaten two slices..."

Elliot grinned and, kicking off her shoes, reached down and pulled off, with great ceremony, her white cotton socks, revealing her dainty manicured toes.

"Your move big boy."

***

15 minutes later and J.D was just finishing his fourth slice. He  had already gotten her to remove her sweater, leaving her in a tight white tank top and her blue jeans.

He popped the last piece of crust in his mouth and chewed, before swallowing and showing his empty mouth to Elliot.

"Aaah." he murmured, sticking out his tongue.

"Okay." Elliot said, standing up after a careful inspection, "Shirt or pants?"

"Shirt. No, pants!" 

"Make up your mind!" she scolded.

"Shirt."

She pulled her top up over her head, revealing her perky breasts nestled in a lacy red bra. She shook her hair out and threw the garment across the room.

A thought occurred to J.D.

"Hey, is underwear one item, or..?"

"Just worry about finishing the next slice, cowboy."

J.D was a little worried. His appetite, after being a nuisance all day, seemed to have abandoned him, and now he was just adding pizza to the massive amount of food he'd already eaten.

He got halfway through the slice without much trouble, but when he hit a particularly large pocket of grease he thought he might throw up. 

"Come on J.D." Elliot sighed seductively, fiddling with her belt, "These pants are so tight, I just want to take them off."

He was more concerned with his own pants. His stuffed stomach was pushing hard against his waistband, cutting into him painfully. Somehow, he managed to finish his slice without it popping off.

"Aaaah."

"Oops." Elliot said, pretending to be surprised as she undid her belt and her jeans slid down, revealing her toned legs and small bottom, with matching red panties. She stepped out of her jeans and picked up the last slice, handing it to J.D.

He groaned, burping to make some room, and tore into the pizza, deciding it would be easier if he did if fast. He crammed pretty much the entire thing into his mouth, grease dripping down his chin, until finally, with a belch, he was finished.

Elliot applauded him and, grabbing his arm, led her bloated boyfriend to the bedroom, for his 'prize'. 

The next morning...
112112.title: Stuffing and Stripping

choices: Two weeks later, and a larger J.D greets Turk and Carla when they return.
Over the next week, J.D starts stuffing himself without Elliot's influence.
1121121.content:
As Elliot rolled off him, the stuffed and drowsy J.D made a promise to himself to get up early tomorrow and go for a jog. This new gut wasn't going to get rid of itself, and he'd have to work extra hard to work off that pizza. His alarm was already set, so everything would be fine...

***

However, when J.D woke up the next morning, it wasn't at the crack of dawn like he'd planned, rather the stroke of ten o'clock. He groaned as he looked at the clock. How had he slept through the alarm?

"Maybe all that food put me in a deeper coma than I thought," he reasoned, reaching out a hand and feeling Elliot's side of the bed was empty. "Ok, I have work at twelve, with Elliot gone I can still skip breakfast, go for a quick run and then shower at the hospital."

Suddenly, the toilet flushed, and J.D realised he wasn't alone after all. Elliot emerged from the bathroom, dressed in track pants and a sweat-stained tank-top.

"Morning sleepyhead!" she said cheerily. "You looked so peaceful, so I snuck out for a quick run. Plus, I figured you could use the rest after last nights 'exertions'..."

As far as J.D could remember, he had just lay on his back, trying not to puke while Elliot gyrated on top of him. But this was still salvageable, a light breakfast with Elliot and he could use the gym at work."

"...And continuing my run as best girlfriend ever..." Elliot smiled, walking to the bedroom door and opening it, "I picked up breakfast."

J.D smiled, but inside he was fearing the worst, and after getting dressed and a quick trip to the bathroom, his fears were confirmed. A brown bag with the familiar golden arches was sitting on the counter, next to a large pink box of donuts. Beside them was a glass of water, and a small green pill.

J.D grabbed the pill and swallowed it down, ("At least I'll have one healthy thing this morning." he thought.), looking over at Elliot, who was sitting on the couch with a box salad and an Egg McMuffin. J.D peeked inside the bag and saw three, no four more McMuffins, along with two large fries and two McGriddles. Salty, greasy food usually turned J.D's stomach this early in the morning... but suddenly his stomach was growling, and his mouth watering. Before he knew it, he had reached into the bag and grabbed two McMuffins, unwrapping them clumsily with one hand, grabbing a handful of fries with the other and cramming them into his mouth.

Over the next fifteen minutes, J.D demolished the entire bag of fast food, oblivious to everything else, even Elliot stripping off and heading for the shower, leaving her clothes strewn around the living room. When she returned, she found J.D sitting on the couch, his small potbelly swollen large with food, laying heavily on his lap, stretching his t-shirt. Elliot brought over the donuts and turned on the TV, leaving the box open on the coffee table. |Over the next forty minutes, J.D found his way to eating eleven of the frosted pastries, leaving one lightly shrunken pink one for Elliot.

Soon it was time to head for the hospital, and a bloated J.D let Elliot drive, while he dozed in the passenger seat. Once he got to the locker room, the combination of loose scrubs and labcoat again made him feel better, and he even got a candy bar from the vending machine on his way to his first patient's room.

"It's not that bad," he thought munching on a particularly crunchy piece of nougat, "You were just hungry, everyone deserves a day or two of gluttony once in a while. And Elliot doesn't seem to mind, judging by last night." He smiled and drifted off, thinking about how sexy she had looked in those black lacy panties. And subconsciously, about how delicious and cheesy that pizza had been.

"Florence!" the sharp bark of Doctor Cox interrupted his inner monologue, and knocked all thoughts of dieting out of his head. By lunch, he was hungry again and eager for more food, and Elliot was waiting for him with a smile and a little green pill.
1121121.title: Mornings and McMuffins

choices: That night the two couples go out to dinner.
Elliot and Carla catch up.
11211211.content:
Over the next two weeks, J.D alternated between worrying about his weight and stuffing his face with food. With Turk and Carla away, Elliot basically moved in, and like before, he found he just couldn't control his appetite when she was around. He would come home from the hospital tired and hungry, to find Elliot had thoughtfully ordered some takeout for dinner, and had also picked up something sweet for dessert. He would go to bed stuffed, and when he woke up, found breakfast waiting for him, Elliot having gotten up early. Work would be a brief respite, but as the days passed, he found himself slotting coins into the vending machines, or sneaking muffins from the nurses' station. Soon he was eating larger and larger portions, and his weight kept creeping up.

But J.D reassured himself with the fact that Elliot hadn't even seemed to notice. Even on Thursday, when they went to the cinema and J.D ate an entire extra-large buttery popcorn, two hotdogs, nachos and a box of Milk Duds, as well as most of Elliot's Twizzlers. She even suggested going to an Chinese Buffet after the movie was over. And she didn't say anything during their picnic on Sunday, when J.D polished off almost an entire roast chicken, a dozen egg salad sandwiches and one and a half apple pies.

It wasn't like he was trying to be unhealthy. He had upped his vitamin intake, and he always meant to go running, but Elliot always reminded him of plans they had made together, or was 'suddenly in the mood'. Even on Wednesday, two days before Turk and Carla's return, he had finally had the chance to go running, but he could only find one of his trainers. And when he was looking for the other one under the bed, he found a large box of fudge that must have gotten misplaced down there last Christmas... Two hours later he had finished off the fudge, and was telling himself he really needed to work out now. Then Elliot arrived home with some Mexican food.

***

J.D kissed his way down Elliot's neck as she writhed beneath him, down on to her bare breast, pausing momentarily to suck on her nipple. He continued down, over her flat stomach, while his hands gently tugged down her white lacy underwear. Finally, he reached it, and took his first taste. It was sweet as chocolate. And then suddenly it was chocolate. Elliot's white skin was now a milky chocolate brown, from the top of her head to the tips of her toes. As he licked and licked, J.D found that she was delicious, the best thing he'd ever tasted. Elliot moaned in ecstasy, her fingers curling into the bed sheets and leaving chocolate stains behind. J.D couldn't restrain himself any longer and took a bite. Elliot didn't seem to mind, in fact she only moaned louder. J.D chewed and swallowed, taking another, even larger bite. He worked his way up her stomach, licking out her belly button, gnawing on her nipples, taking a love bite out of her neck, then kissing her lips, and feeling them melt beneath his...

"J.D, wake up, Turk and Carla's flight lands in an hour."

J.D's eyes snapped open, and he saw Elliot looking down at him, already dressed in a white summer dress. He rubbed his eyes and got up clumsily, the last vestiges of his dream still clouding his head, as he looked for his clothes. As he dressed, his added poundage was fairly evident. As he bent over to grab some socks, his butt bulged outwards and his boxers rode down, revealing his butt-crack. His chest was a lot flabbier, and could easily be called man boobs, which jiggled slightly as he struggled to pull his pants up over his rounding buttocks. The biggest change was his stomach. Once flat, he now possessed a large belly, about the size of a basketball. He pulled on a t-shirt, and it only fell to slightly below his belly button, leaving a small lower portion of his stomach exposed. He pulled at it, almost subconsciously, but it only rode straight back up. He bent over (difficult with his new gut) and slipped on his shoes.

He walked out into the living room and sat on the couch. He heard the jingling of keys, and saw Elliot standing by the door, waiting for him.

"No breakfast?" he asked.

Elliot smiled and put on her sunglasses. "We'll get something on the way."

***

"Carla, over here!"

They had arrived at the airport, and after waiting twenty minutes in the arrivals area, just as J.D was beginning to look around for something to eat, Elliot spotted their friends pushing a luggage trolley.

"Turk!" J.D cried out, running to hug his best friend.

"J.D!" he heard in reply, as he was pulled into a bear hug. A massive bear hug. A much bigger bear hug than he remembered...

As he stepped back, he saw he wasn't the only one who had put on a little weight. Turk was sporting a belly, about half the size of J.D's, and his face was a little chubbier too. As he leaned over to hug Elliot hello, J.D saw that Turk's ass had taken most of the extra pounds, and his shorts were so tight it was easy to see that each butt cheek was about the size of a volleyball. J.D was chubby, leaning towards fat, with a big belly, while Turk was kind of bigger all over, with an emphasis on ass. While the two friends took each other in, there was a kind of awkward pause.

Elliot and Carla did their best to fill it. "How was the honeymoon?" Elliot began.

"Oh it was amazing, the beach, the room, the scenery, everything was beautiful."

Another little bit of silence.

Elliot played her ace. "And the food?"

This snapped both Turk and J.D out of it. "Man, the food was amazing, I'm talking shrimp and steak every night!" Turk said exuberantly.

"Nice, and dessert?" J.D asked excitedly.

"Two words man," Turk grinned, "Dessert cart."

The awkwardness forgotten, the two friends chatted away for five minutes straight about the meals they had eaten over the past two weeks. Suddenly, food was just another thing they had in common."

Carla interrupted them. "Elliot and I are going to get some coffee, maybe you boys want to get some food?"

Turk had eaten two dinners, half of Carla's and a giant Toblerone on the flight, and J.D had made Elliot stop for cheeseburgers on the way, but talking about food was enough to get their motors running and their mouths watering.

"There's a KFC in the food court." Elliot suggested, and like that they were gone. Carla and Elliot laughed, and taking the trolley, went to get a coffee and 'catch up.'
11211211.title: Gains and Greetings

choices: While the boys get fatter, the girls get fitter.
Everyone gains.
112112112.content:
"Well Mrs. Espinosa," Elliot smiled, handing her friend a coffee and sitting down opposite her, "I must say, that is some damn fine work."

Carla grinned, taking a sip, "You didn't do too badly yourself Ms. Reid."

"Did you see the way their bellies were bouncing off of each other when they hugged?"

J.D and Turk would be shocked, but this was the reason that Elliot and Carla had finally bonded. Their icy relationship had thawed when they caught each other checking out a chunky intern's butt. Soon they were confiding in each other, sharing fantasies and preferences. They had both dreamed of fattening someone up, but had agreed that they would wait until they were in a committed relationship. With Carla and Turk's wedding, and J.D and Elliot getting back together, they had finally decided it was time to put their plans into action.

"J.D looks like he swallowed a basketball." Carla laughed, "It's hard to believe he was so skinny just two weeks ago."

"I know, those pills are something else." Elliot said, picking at a muffin she'd gotten for herself.

"I slipped two into Turk's champagne, and I swear he ate about six slices of wedding cake. Bust the button right off his tuxedo pants."

"I told J.D they were vitamins, he's been taking two a day ever since."

Carla's eyes gleamed. "That's genius. I had to sneak them to him in his drinks. Aside from that, it was easy. Breakfast buffets, 24 hour room service, he was popping out of his swim trunks by Friday. Luckily there was a nudist beach 5 minutes away."

Elliot licked her lips. "Man I would have killed to see that."

"Oh don't worry, I had my camera. It was hilarious, seeing all these perky breasts and tight abs, and then Turk's flabby ass bobbing around in the waves."

They laughed, before Carla continued. "Still, even when he was stuffing his face with his eighth plate of seafood, if I stopped eating, he'd suddenly get all concerned and self-conscious."

"Ugh, I know, J.D was the same. I probably eaten twice as much as I would normally over the last two weeks. I've had to go running every morning just to keep the weight off."

"I wasn't so lucky," Carla grimaced, lifting up her tank top and showing off a small potbelly, "And my ass is even bigger. Nowhere to work out at out resort. In fairness, that's partly why I chose it."

"If you want, I'll be working out again tomorrow." Elliot offered, sipping her latte.

"I might just have to." Carla smiled, "As long as Turk can't come with us."

"Just hide one of his running shoes, he'll be too lazy to look for it."

They sat in happy silence for a few minutes. Then Elliot frowned. "You don't think they suspect do you? Now they're together, won't they notice what's happened?"

***

J.D and Turk sat in KFC, both having gone for a Family-sized bucket of Original Recipe with Coleslaw. Each was about halfway through, grease and crumbs staining their faces and hands. J.D's stomach was crammed awkwardly against the table, while Turk was perched uncomfortably, balancing his massive butt on a single vinyl chair.

Suddenly a look of realization crossed J.D's face. "Turk..."

Turk looked up, he's cheeks bulging with chicken. "Whuh?"

"I just realized something," J.D paused to sip his soda, "We've got free refills."

"Sweet!"

They high-fived and went back to eating.

***

"I doubt it." Carla shrugged. "Do you think we should tell them?"

Elliot bit her lip. "I don't know. It's so cute when J.D tries to suck in his gut, or stands on the scales looking all confused."

Carla nodded. "Turk insists the laundry service was shrinking his clothes."

Elliot finished the last of her muffin, "Then let's just keep them in the dark, for now at least."

Carla smiled and got up, heading for the door. Her thong was clearly visible through her stretched cotton shorts.

Elliot gasped. "Wow, your ass is bigger."

"Shut up!" Carla laughed, waggling her butt a little and slapping it. "Turk seems to like it anyway."

***

They got back from the airport and both couples retired to their respective bedrooms. After two hours, both guys emerged, tired but hungry. Carla ordered some pizzas while Elliot made up a few bowls of snacks to tide them over. Four large pizzas and three dozen hot wings disappeared within an hour and a half. The girl's would get up, leaving their men to sleep off last night's big meal, and go running, alternating between jogging, running and sprinting, interspersed with breaks for push-ups and sit-ups. The smell of frying was usually enough to bring Turk and J.D stumbling to the breakfast table, where they would proceed to stuff themselves with anything they could get their hands on. When the time came to head to work, Carla or Elliot would drive, J.D and Turk having found it increasingly difficult to squeeze into the drivers seat, preferring to lounge in the back.

"That's great, just a few more."

Taking a deep breath, Elliot once again fixed a smile on her face and flexed her biceps, angling her body slightly towards the camera.

Despite Carla's misgivings, the photo shoot had turned out to be perfectly legitimate. Arriving at the address he had given them, they shared a glance when he pointed them down to the basement, but what they found was a professional looking studio, complete with a make-up chair and a small hospitality area. Reassured, they stripped down to their bikinis and fixed their hair and make-up in the vanity mirror, before stepping in front of the camera.

While they were a little reserved at first, the muscle-bound pair soon loosened up, enjoying showing off their sculpted bodies. They posed, flexing and tensing, twisting and turning to show off every bulging muscle, as the camera whirred and flashed. After a while the photographer asked for individual shots, and Carla went first, while Elliot stood behind the camera, shouting more and more outrageous suggestions for poses, which Carla reciprocated when it was Elliot's turn.

With a final flash and a few rapid clicks, the photographer told Elliot they were finished. She stepped down and gratefully accepted the bottle of water Carla handed her, chugging half of it in one gulp. After a brief chat with the photographer about the pictures, Carla brought up the issue of money. Instantly the photographer pulled two envelopes out if his pocket and handed them over, telling them their was a hundred dollars in each, and that their would probably be more once he submitted these photos to the agencies.

Both Carla and Elliot were pretty satisfied with a hundred dollars for 'work' that had taken under an hour. They got redressed and headed back out to their car.

"Well," Carla said as she sat into the driver's seat, "I guess you were right about that guy not just being a creep."

Elliot nodded, still feeling a little giddy with excitement.

"Still," Carla continued, "I suppose other supermodels don't go straight from the shoot to pick up dinner for their less -than-super husbands and boyfriends."

They drove to a fast-food place quite near the apartment, where the two muscular women ordering enough food for ten people no longer drew that much attention from the staff. After ordering three dozen cheeseburgers and twenty orders of fries, and stopping at a bodega to pick up a few pallets of beer and a couple of gallons of ice-cream, they made their way back to the apartment. As they stood in the elevator surrounded by their purchases, Carla did the math. This meal had already accounted for over half of the money they had just earned. Elliot frowned as they arrived at their floor, hoisting up the heavy bags easily. It seemed modelling wasn't going to be the easy a solution to their money problems that she had hoped for.

***

Inside the apartment, they found Turk sprawled on the couch. He had returned from work, but hadn't bothered to change out of his straining scrubs, the minor exertions of his day obviously having exhausted the small reserves of energy he had. He looked like he was asleep, but the smell of burgers quickly caused his eyes to snap open.

"Food!" He yelled happily, wiping some sleep drool from his chin. This brought a crash from the bedroom, and the sound of lumbering footsteps as JD appeared in the hallway, still dressed only a pair of boxer shorts. Elliot tutted theatrically.

"JD, did you not get dressed at all today?"

"Um..." He mumbled, staring fixedly at the bag of food in his girlfriend's hand.

Elliot sighed, like a long-suffering but indulgent mother. "Go get dressed, then maybe you can have some burgers."

With that, she leaned over and emptied them out on to the coffee table. Turk dug in with a gleeful yell, and JD instinctively took a step towards the food, but Carla stride forward and blocked his way, shaking her head with mock sadness. JD opened his mouth to speak, but thought better of it, instead turning around and hurrying to the bedroom, his big belly bouncing of the doorframe in his haste.

Carla and Elliot laughed, turning to watch as Turk tried to take full advantage by eating as fast as he possibly could. After cramming two orders of fries in his mouth and washing them down with a beer, he seemed to remember something.

"How was the shoot?" He asked, through a mouthful of beef and cheese.

Carla smiled, dabbing some sauce from his chin with a napkin. "It was actually really fun, plus we got paid."

Turk swallowed. "He didn't try anything, did he? Because I can go down there and kick his ass."

Carla doubted her husband could get off the couch without help, but it was still sweet. "Thanks papi, but no, he was a perfect gentlemen."

JD finally emerged, having squeezed himself into a pair of scrubs pants and pulled one of Elliot's gym t-shirts over his head, which just about covered his jiggling man breasts. He sat down next to Turk, the couch creaking and squeaking in protest, and almost choked as he shoved three burgers into his mouth at once.

After watching for a few more minutes and taking two burgers and an order of fries for themselves, Carla and Elliot left them to it, the initial feeding frenzy having slowed into a methodical binge.

As they left, JD watched them go. He still hadn't told Turk the significance of their earlier investigation, because he still didn't know what he was going to do about it. He grabbed another handful of fries, glancing down at his enormously fattened body. Even if he wanted revenge, what could he do?
112112112111211.title: Meanwhile, at the photo shoot.

choices: Refuse the pills and confront his scheming girlfriend
Take the pills and keep up the pretence
1121121121112112.content:
Beee-uurrrrp "Ummh."

Loosing a long conclusive belch, JD finally let his tired arms go limp. The silver scoop dropped alongside the couch, and a huge empty tub of cookie dough ice cream rolled lazily down his manboobs and across the long shelf of his belly.

Through bleary eyes JD watched for a moment as the tub teetered on the edge of his massive gut, before apparently considering the jump to dangerous and rolling back to bump gently against his man boobs.

He grunted and burped again. Stuffed with a dozen burgers and numerous packs of fries, a gallon of beer and a gallon of ice cream, his stomach was almost impossibly full and round, pinning him to the sofa and bulging so far forward that even a tumbling ice-cream tub lacked the momentum to make it off the edge.

Wedged next to him, Turk was snoring soundly. In his desire to cram down as many burgers as possible before JD joined the meal, Turk had eaten too fast and worn himself out, falling asleep after eight burgers and four packs of fries, leaving his buddy with a larger share of the food.

That had suited JD just fine. He'd eaten the huge amount that constituted his fill, and then had a hefty second helping to boot. He looked at his enormous gut, heaving up and down before him, packed and straining beyond capacity.

"Coo-ee!"

JD lifted his sleepy eyes over the summit of his stomach to see Elliot grinning, leaning against the doorframe.

"Did you get enough to eat baby?"

Buh-hurp!

Elliot smirked. "Just as I thought." She sauntered into the room, and gave her boyfriend a kiss on the cheek. Then, standing up, she flicked the empty ice cream tub off his swollen belly and set down a saucer in its place.

"Hey, what gives!" grunted JD, feeling the cold china touch his skin.

"Time for your vitamins!" Elliot patted the underside of her boyfriend's heaving dome of a belly and nodded at the saucer. "After a big meal like that, I thought'd you'd need an extra large dose. They help with digestion too." She leaned forward, and reached her arms wide to plac a hand on either side of JD's massive belly, rubbing his flanks softly.

"And from how tight your tummy feels, I'd say you've got a loooot of digestin' to do."

As Elliot coninued to rub, JD looked down grogily at the saucer, on which sat four small green pills. In his food-dazed state and with the pleasant sensation of his girlfriend's fingers massagin his gut, he was struggling to think straight. But just as he was about to scarf the pills, he remembered.

Fettrex!

"What's wrong baby?"

Fingers paused above the plate, JD glanced up to see Elliot looking down at him with concern.

What does he do?
1121121121112112.title: JD consults some outside help.

choices: JD and Turk start taking more and more pills
JD an Turk start demanding finer, richer foods
11211211211121122.content:
"What's the matter JD, brainfreeze?" Elliot tilted her blonde head with concern. "The pills will help."

JD looked up, his fingers still poised above the saucer. But just as he was about to knock them off his stomach and call out Elliot about the whole scheme, a thought suddenly struck him.

He'd spent so much time thinking how to get revenge at the girls that he'd never considered why they'd been trying to fatten him and Turk up in the first place.

There could only be one reason, really, and Eliot's hands on his gut had confirmed it: the girls were fattening them up because they wanted then fat: they liked their men fat. It was pretty obvious now he thought about it.

The million dollar question was, how could he and Turk work it to their advantage, and get their revenge?

After a few moments of silent thought, he looked up at Elliot with a smile. "You're right babe!" he said, swipomg the pills from the plate and shoved them into his mouth, swallowing hard.

"In fact," he added, stifling another burp, "I think I could use a couple more." JD put a hand to his vast gut. "I feel a little woozy in here already - don't think that twelfth burger's agreeing with me."

Elliot hesitated. JD had eaten a huge amount, even by his greedy standards. She'd given him the pills with the hope that in an hour or so he'd be ready to put a serious dent in the big chocolate cake out in the kitchen. If he had a bigger dose, he might try to eat the entire thing - which would be a whole lot on top of what he'd devoured already. She looked at JD's gigantic pulsating orb of a belly, stuffed ot the max with a greedy feast of burgers, fries and ice cream. Could he really take that much more?

On the other hand, the thought of her boyfriend gorging himself to even greater extremes was quite a turn on. And...well, she didn't want him to get suspicious.

After a few more moments she made up her mind.

"Sure thing sweetie," Elliot smiled, turning to head for the kitchen.

As she departed, JD grinned, linking his hands behind his head. His plan was in motion. For too long the girls had been playing him and Turk for fools. So they wanted their men fat, did they? Fine. He'd show them fat; and damn wel make them work for it.

JD leaned back, accepting the second round of pills from a slightly nervous looking Elliot, who'd already returned from the kitchen. The best part of his plan was that he and Turk would get to keep eating like kings - better even!

Smiling at his own genius, he closed his eyes for a little nap, his majestic belly beginning to gurgle noisily as the Fettrex worked its magic.
11211211211121122.title: Take the pills and keep up the pretence

choices: Success! Pies ingested, the boys begin to snore
Failure! Somehow JD still wants more
112112112111211221.content:
GLEEEUURRRRP MUNCH BAAAH-HUUURRRP!

Bouncing off the doorframe, Elliot staggered into the kitchen. Panting hard she rested both palms heavily on the table and looked across the room towards the oven. A wide, muscular ass clad in fine lycra jogging bottoms blocked her view.

"How oof wheeze long now?" she puffed, brushing a strand of blonde hair from her brow.

CRUNCH SLUUURRRP GULP

Carla's reply was drowned out by the raucous sound of gluttonous gorging, pounding through the apparently paper-thin wall from living room, where the men in their lives were engaged in a frenzied, fetterex-fuelled feast of fried chicken.

"C'mon hufff Carla!" Elliot called, taking advantage of a rare lull in the sounds of consumption and the crackle of greasy paper, as the boys no doubt tossed aside empty family buckets and began to hastily unwrap zinger towers. "Those burgers won't hold them much longer!"

Even if there are ten each, she added quietly to herself, dropping her firm, athletic haunches into a chair for respite.

Sure enough, the gutteral racket of eating soon resumed.

GOBBLE UUURRFF SLURRPP MUNCH

"I said, just, urf, a couple more minutes." Carla slammed the oven door shut and rose to her feet, padding over to take the char next to Elliot.

For a few moments, the two young doctors sat slumped in the kitchen chairs, listening to what could best be described as an awful, cacophonous rock concert of gluttony coming from the living room.

Fuelled by huge doses of fetterex, JD and Turk's already gargantuan appetites had for the past month been at maximum overdrive, but today was beyond anything Elliot and Carla had experienced. It had begun pretty much as normal, the girls heading out for their hour-long dawnbreak run, returning just in time to cook a vast six course breakfast including mounds of bacon, egg and sausage, and stacks of pancakes and waffles that almost touched the ceiling. The smell was enough to rouse their lethargic lovers - but, as had become the norm recently, not enough to entice the hefty guys out of the sack. So, Elliot and Carla had once again served their mountainous men a colossal breakfast in bed, by the end of which even the reinforced steel frames were creaking in agony.

The result had been pretty predictable: indigestion, and urgent requests for those magic green pills to ease their gurgling overfed tummies. A matter of minutes after the fetterex had been gulped down, the guys had been ravenous once again. Thus breakfast was been closely followed by an epic brunch of burgers, donuts and eclairs, which the girls picked up during their mid-morning jog.

Discussing how to prodouce an affordable dinner as they returned from their Saturday afternoon gym session, Elliott and Carla were shocked by the sight of a Dominos delivery boy, totting a leaning tower of pizzas towards their front door, JD and Turk having apparently been too hungry to wait for lunch, despite their enormous brunch. As the girls showered, the guys comsumed four sixteen-inch meat feast pizzas each at competitive speed while lounging on the couches (Elliot had recently had to buy a second sofa, so they could have one each) bellies rising towards the ceiling as they stuffed down greasy slices in quick succession.

Yet despite leaving the guys with a tableful of chocolates and bonbons to snack on when they went for their 6pm photo shoot (obviously they told JD and Turk they were going back to the gym for an extra workout), Elliot and Carla had been utterly gobsmacked to return, just over an hour ago to the smelll and sight of an entire battery farm's worth of fried chicken takout covering the coffee table and a good part of the floor as well.

GLUURRP UUMMPH MUNCH CRUNCH SLURRP Ping!

Elliot was startled out of her thoughts by a ping which she initially mistook for another button popping off one of the guys shirts in the living room. Just as she was cursing JD for ruining another shirt, she realised it was the oven - and remembered that the guys were wearing t-shirts anyway: t-shirts that had already ridden up all the way to their "pecs" thanks to the sheer amount their huge wobbling stomachs had expanded over a day of near-constant gorging.

As Carla got up to attend to the pies, Elliot sighed. It was pretty obvious what had happened. The guys had taken more pills when they'd gone to the gym, probably after getting stomachache from all those sweets and choccies they'd left out, and the extra fetterex had rekindled their colossal hunger.

Pushing back her blonde hair, the athletic medic frowned. It was a trend that was happening more and more: JD and Turk requesting more fetterex to "improve their health" or ease their indigestion, with the result that they were clamouring for more and more food more and more frequently. And as much as it was a major turn on for both her and Carla, it had left the household finances almost as ridiculously stretched as JD and Turk's gigantic balloon-like stomachs. The girls had maxed out the number of photoshoots they did and took as many shifts at the hospital as they could manage shifts (picking up a slack left by the boys, who lacked the energy to do more than a couple a week). Constantly tired, and with less time to work out, Elliot and Carla had to cut down their gym attendance significantly - though the workout they got from running around after their increasingly lazy and demanding mates went some way to making up for it.

But that was the part that annoyed Elliot the most. Previously, she and Carla had been fully in control, thanks to their superior strength: setting meal times, denying the guys extra helpings until they'd got dressed, forcing them to get out of bed for breakfast and so on. Since the boys had gone on their fetterex health kick, however, there had been a subtle shift of power. Despite being ridiculously fat and impossibly lazy, JD and Turk - or at least their stomachs - seemed, somehow, to rule the roost. Again, the fetterex was to blame. Taking so much of it, the guys were constantly beset by terrible hunger pangs, had were always whinging like overgrown babies for more food, clutching and stroking their bulbous bellies and groaning in dismay in a way that made the girls weak at the knees to the point that, overwhelmed with lust, they always gave in to their demands - serving breakfast in bed, rushing out for pastries to satisfy a sudden craving, baking apple pies like dutiful housewives.

Elliot shook her head. This had to change.

But what could she do? JD was such a hypercondriac. After months of plying him with the little green pills, if she turned round now and said there were bad side effects for taking too many, he'd surely panic and look them up. Substituting a placebo would be too obvious: the pills were a very distinctive shape. And there was no way she could confess the truth.

The dismayed doctor sighed. She was caught between a rock and a hard place.

She of course had no idea that it was all intentional on the guys part: that JD had found out her plan to fatten them, and that he and Turk were purposefully taking more pills to make the girls work like slaves - at home and at work - to keep their voraceous men contentedly fed.

Just then, the pots and pans dangling above Elliot's head began to tremble and clang, as two long gargantuan belches sounded from the living room, almost causing the walls to shake.

The two worn-out women looked at one another. That was their cue. Hauling herself up from the chair, she accepted the vast apple pie that Carla handed her. The thing was monstrous, around ten inches high and sixteen in circumferences, loaded with enough sugar and cream to sink a battleship, and pulsating with heat despite being left to stand to cool for five minutes.

Within another five, it would be just another flabby bulge on JD's spherical belly or beachball sized ass.

Elliot sighed. Right now, she just hoped it would be enough to send him into a food coma. A glance at Carla confirmed that she was having similar thoughts about Turk.

Without further ado, the pie-totting pair trotted towards the living room, where their lovers, and their stomachs, awaited.

1121121121112112211.content:
The girls heard the sounds of light snoring. Both girls let out a sigh of relief. They both know that the boys’ food induced coma would make them tap a long nap. They quietly tip toe to Elliot’s private office room and closed the door. When Elliot moved in she took a spare bedroom and convert into her office and walked in closet. She forbidden J.D. to enter her own private space and he agreed as he assume that it is very messy and he know Elliot would get upset that he broke part of her trust.

“Thank heavens they finally stopped. I am so exhausted. I feared that they would become bottomless pits.” said Carla as she relaxed on a chair while Elliot relaxed on her office chair.

“I know I thought we would run out of food. ’said Elliot. Suddenly her cell phone let out a ring and she answered it.

“Hello.” answered Elliot.

“Hello is this Elliot Reid. “asked a male voice.

“Yes this is Elliot Reid. To whom I am speaking to?” asked Elliot

“My name is Mort Stein. I am a layer who deal will wills and inheritance. The reason for this call is that I have some bad news. Your great aunt Charlotte Fields past away last night per her instruction I am telling you that her funeral will happen next week. going into medicine but not the field I wanted so he cut off paying for college and I had to get a job. After that I cut off all connection with him and my brother are so-so as some keep in contact while other don’t call me. The only family member I really love was my great aunt Charlotte. 11211211211121122112.content:
A knock at the door breaks Elliot and Carla out of their embrace. Elliot frowns. "Are we expecting someone?"

"Not unless the boys ordered more takeout," jokes Carla.

The two women look at each other in horror.

"Surely not."

But it surely is. There on the threshold stands a similarly geeky delivery boy, weighted down with ten near-to-bursting paper bags packed with burgers, fries, milkshakes and ice cream.

"How are we going to pay for all this," hisses Carla to Elliot as they lug the bags into the living room, setting them down on the coffee table. They both decided there was no point taking them into the kitchen - the boys will want to eat as soon as they wake up.

Shrugging, Elliot pulls out a bag of fries and starts to nibble. "Credit card. And cut back on those extra circuit training sessions we pay for, I guess." She offers the bag to Carla. "We get enough exercise running around after JD and Turk anyway."

"But it's not proper fitness," complains the hot Hispanic girl. "We're losing muscle." She forlornly flexes a not-quite-so-massive-as-before bicep.

Elliot looks down at her own six-pack. It's still impressive, as toned as ever, but there's no doubting her waist looks leaner. Carla's right, but what can they do. "We'll figure out something. But until then..." the blonde sighs in resignation: "needs must."

Eyes closed on the couch, JD smiles in silent delight. Everything is going to plan. He and Turk are living the life, and soon the girls won't be strong enough to boss them about, telling them where to sit, or forcing them to get dressed before being allowed to eat in the morning. If he wants a snack, he'll be able to go into the kitchen for a whenever he wants, and Carla and Elliot won't be strong enough to stop him any more. All he and Turk have to do is keep this up a little longer. Keep popping Fetterex: keep the food bills up so the girls have less time and money to build muscle.

Which reminds him...

Grunting noisily and sniffing inquisiviely, JD feigns waking up.

"Do I smell... burgers?" he says, elbowing Turk awake.
11211211211121122112.title: here was a knock at the door.

Carla suggests a little partner swapping.
1121121122.content:
Elliot and Carla remained undecided about whether or not they wanted to gain some weight themselves. Two months later however, the decision had been made for them. Spending all their time with Turk and JD meant spending all of their time around food, and pretty soon the boy's habit's started to rub off on them.

Having just watched someone devour three large pizzas by themselves, it was easy to rationalise eating one yourself. When your clothes started to feel a little snug, it was hard to feel fat next to someone who just burst out of their pants. Even when the scale started to creep up into the higher digits, it was easy to ignore when you watched someone step on to it and break it.

Food had become such a central part of their lives, even in the bedroom. Carla liked to stuff Turk until he was groaning, but didn't complain when he returned the favour. Elliot liked to tie JD up and tease him with all sorts of delicious food, and before long she was torturing him by eating it all herself.

After two months of this, while the guys stayed a few steps ahead in terms of weight, Elliot and Carla were far from skinny themselves.
1121121122.title: Everyone gains.

choices: Time for Dinner
Free time to burn before dinner.
The Villa has a buffet set up for them inside...
12.content:
Four years earlier (before Isabella arrived)...

"I do" Turk said to Carla, and with that they were married. Of course their priest was a patient at the Hospital because Turk had failed to show up for the actual wedding ceremony, and they were married in the hospital room. They were finally married and off they went to their all-expense-paid honeymoon in Fiji on the luxurious Turtle Island. They were so happy to be married and excited to have two weeks off at the hospital to just enjoy each others' company and relax.

Carla called out commands to Turk as the packed the car to go the the airport,

"Luggage?"
"Check," Turk replied.
"All three suitcases and the carry-ons?"
"Yes, dear."
"Camera?"
"Check."
"Passports!"
"Check. Carla, honey, this is the third time through the list...we have it all. Just get in the car and lets go!"
"Ok, sweety, I'm just going to grab my purse and then off to Fiji!"

Turk and Carla got their stuff together and made their way to the airport. They checked their bags and made their way to the terminal. They waited at the terminal and then final boarded the plane. The plane was going to be a long 11 and a half hour flight; Turk was not excited about this, but the destination was well worth the flight, and then the flight attendant started her regular in-flight safety speech,

"In the seat pocket in front of you is a pamphlet about the safety features of this plane. Please follow along while I demonstrate in the front. There are 5 exits aboard this plane: 2 at the front, 2 over the wings, and one out the plane's rear end. If you're seated in one of the exit rows, please do not store your bags by your feet..."

Turk tried to listen, but the food choices for the flight caught his attention instead; it was going to be a long flight and he can't remember having eaten anything before leaving...

Fruit & Cheese Plate - Healthy sized wedges of Cheddar, Smoked Gouda, and Brie offered with juicy Grapes, Pecan halves, and dried Apricots. Served with Pepperidge Farm® Crackers. - $6

"Maybe something a little more substantial," he thought.

Thai Chicken Salad - Headlined by a sliced Thai Grilled Chicken Breast, this salad includes a bountiful mix of Mesculun Mixed Greens, Basil, Cilantro, Fresh Mint Leaves, Julienned Red Peppers, Mandarin Oranges, Shredded Carrots, and Peanuts. Served with Ginger Dressing and Breadsticks. Note: chicken, dressing, and breadsticks served individually. - $8

"It is a twelve hour flight...this won't hold me."

Homestyle Steak Burger - A 1/2 pound Angus burger sits on garlic toast with sautéed spinach, roasted tomatoes, onions and tangy Hollandaise sauce. It's served next to sides of homemade fries and coleslaw. - $10

Slightly Famous Steak Sandwich - Tender chuck steak, grilled to your liking, on a Sheboygan hard roll with melted provolone, mushrooms, horseradish mayo, fried onion strings & side of your choice. - $10

Turk's mouth started watering, "There we go," he thought, "Finally something good."

And the flight attendant finished, "Thank you for choosing and enjoy your flight. The flight attendants will be around to offer beverages and meals when we have reached a safe cruising altitude."

"This is going to be so great!" Carla whispered to Turk as she grabbed his arm.
"I know! These meals sound amazing."
"I was talking about the honeymoon."
"Oh, yeah, it is some well deserved r and r."
"The brochure looked stunning I can only imagine it in person."

The plane reached cruising altitude and the flight attendant came around. Carla got a water and a fruit and cheese platter. Turk got a soda and couldn't decide between the burger or the steak sandwich, so he got them both.

"Hey just because were married doesn't mean you can let yourself go...I only married you for your body. " Carla said with a laugh.
"Yeah I know." Turk smiled back.

Their food came and Turk began devouring his burger. He was much hungrier than he thought. Soon his entire plate was licked clean and he moved on the his steak sandwich.

"Holy cow Turk!" Carla exclaimed, who had not even half finished her snacks, "This is a long flight, you can slow down, and anyway we have dinner reservations when we arrive."
"Yeah, it is a long flight. I won't be full by the end. Don't worry."

Turk finished eating his steak meal and his belly was bloated to the max. He loosened his seat belt and went to sleep. He hadn't slept all night because of the early departure. Carla fell asleep to.

The plane ride went pretty fast after they fell asleep and when they woke up there were only three hours left. Turk ordered some snacks and finished the remained of the trip watching the end of the in flight movie. When they landed in Figi it was around 6 at night. The two got their luggage and checked into their villa for their two week honeymoon.
12.title: Turk and Carla take a honeymoon.

choices: Later that night back at the hotel...Turk's still hungry - late night snack.
Next day at the beach.
121.content:
"Ok, Turk, get ready for dinner. Our reservations are a 8 so we only have 45 minutes." Carla said.
"Yup."

Turk jumped on the bed while Carla went off to shower. Turk sat on the bed and watched t.v. Carla finished her shower and got dressed.

"You look beautiful."
"Thanks, Turk, now you better get ready or else we'll be late."

Turk showered and got dressed and off they went to dinner at Ohana Restaurant. When they got there the dining room was dimly lit by candle light and each table was separated by a loose translucent sheet. The tables were covered in rose petals and there was a bottle of champagne cooling for them.

"How gorgeous," Carla whispered to Turk.

They sat down and ordered. Carla got the Lemon Grass and pan-seered Mahi-Mahi. Turk got the all you can eat seafood medley and the side of fries and onion strings. Their food came and Turk dug in. He finished his first plate of seafood and sent out for the next. While he was waiting he chowed down on the fries.

"Hungry much?" Carla asked.
"Yeah, plus we're paying for this so we might as well eat it all."
"Actually, its already paid for...this is an all expense paid trip."
"Yeah that's what I meant. Eat up."
"Anyway what do you want to do tomorrow? I was thinking we go spend the day at the beach."
