Despite her mildly chiding tone, Carla had to admit, at least to herself, that Turk wasn't totally to blame for his current predicament. It had been the couple's last morning at the buffet and she'd been determined to make it count. After getting her chubby and still quite sleepy husband comfortably seated in a booth, she'd set to work, ferrying overloaded plates of breakfast goodies from the serving counters to their table at such a speed that no matter how quickly Turk gobbled up the food he was constantly half-hidden behind stacks of bacon, sausage, toast, eggs, waffles and pancakes. They were both so engrossed in it that they'd lost track of how late it was getting. By the time Carla had helped extricate her incredibly bloated husband from the booth they had barely an hour before the flight was due to take off.

Last call, Mr and Mrs Turk. Flight 107. Last call.

It took all of Carla's cajoling, but they got there in the nick of time. The strict looking female steward eyed Turk's t-shirt as though he might be trying to smuggle a medicine ball aboard, but soon they found themselves on the plane.

Wheezing like an elephant that had just run a marathon, Turk collapsed into his seat with a thump.

"Ugh, these planes" he grumbled, trying to get his wide ass comfortable while simultaneously tugging at the seatbelt.

"Just relax," soothed Carla, watching his difficulties with glee. Allowing herself a wicked grin she leaned out into to the aisle.

"Uh miss... miss!"

The red pencil-skirted flight attendant walked over with a smile.

"Yes ma'am?"

Carla nodded casually towards her squirming husband.

"I think we may need a seatbelt extender over here."

Turk blushed crimson.

-------

"What do you think they'll say?"

"Hmm?" Diligently squeezing a tube of chocolate sauce onto his fudge brownie, Turk barely acknowledged his wife's question. He frowned in concentration as he pushed his thumbs along the cannister as if it were a near-empty tube of toothpaste, causing sauce to drip slowly but thickly down the sides of the generously sized dessert and pool up in the plate. He felt like he'd been cheated. The equivalent strawberry tube for his cheesecake hadn't been nearly so full.

A sharp sensation at the side of his belly jolted the cannister upwards, a blog of chocolate sauce flying onto the back of the seat in front.

"Hey! - buurp! - Watch it!" he groused, shuffling in his seat, his belly rubbing against the armrests. This flight was uncomfortable enough without his wife poking him in the sides. To avoid any further incursions he tried to recall what she'd said. "What do I think who'll say?"

Carla smiled. "Elliot and JD, of course."

"About mmph what?" asked Turk through lips stained with sauce. His cheeks bulged obliviously.

Carla rolled her eyes.

"About This!" she said. Smiling delightedly as she smoothed her fingers gently over Turk's indulgently swollen belly. Cramped into the small plane seat it looked and felt particularly portly this morning, pushing out well into his plump legs, and Carla was thrilled to see the shorts they'd bought yesterday looking tight already. It was probably just because Turk was sitting down, of course, causing his meaty thighs to bulge, but she couldn't help wondering if all that breakfast had had an effect too.

Not to mention the three bags of peanuts, two cokes and two three-course lunches he'd devoured since boarding.

Annexing another slice of cake, Turk shrugged. "Everyone gains a little weight on honeymoon." He nodded casually towards her. "You've put on some too."

Carla could only laugh. "I suppose so papi," she said, placing a hand on her very slightly curved abdomen. It was true, she'd probably picked up five or six honeymoon pounds herself. With Turk eating around the clock it was hard to avoid it. They were constantly surrounded by food and some of it inevitably managed to find its way into her own stomach - despite Turk's admirable efforts to eat up every crumb himself.

Keeping up this trend, he took advantage of her daydreaming to skewer the slice of cheesecake on her plate and transfer it to his own.

"Papi!"

Turk shrugged. "Just tryin' to help you keep the pounds off. Pass me that tube of strawberry."

Complying with a chuckle, Carla took another opportunity to admire the belly into which this third dessert would soon be descending. She hadn't been too surprised when Turk had agreed to put on a few pounds, but she'd never quite expected him to go for it with such... gusto. If she'd acquired five or six new pounds, Turk must've packed on what - six, seven times that much? More? He'd really thrown himself into it.

Then again, thought Carla, watching him shovel another big piece of cheesecake between his lips, what husband wouldn't, given free reign to stuff his face? Men loved to eat.

As Turk was licking his plate after his third dessert, the seatbelt lights pinged on.

Ladies and gentlemen, the tannoy crackled to life. this is your captain speaking. We're about to enter an area of mild turbulence. We ask you to remain seated and buckle up.

Clipping her own belt together, Carla turns to her husband with a smile. "Buckle up baby." She smirked. Adding, under her voice: "If you can."
121212121.title: In-flight feasting

choices: Turk wakes up to find Carla went to dinner without him.
Turk gets up and goes to dinner, and pigs out again.
12122.content:
Carla dropped the subject of Turk's weight and the pair settled down for their day at the beach. First they simply sat in their loungers, soaking up the sun. Carla read her book while Turk lay back, scoping out the topless sunbathers under the cover of his sunglasses. A little later, as the sun rose even higher in the sky, they decided to go for a swim to cool off, frolicking in the surf, exchanging salty kisses in the clear blue water. At one point a large wave almost pulled Turk's shorts down, revealing the very top of his rounding butt cheeks. Carla laughed until a even bigger wave knocked her off her feet.

They decided to dry off with a walk along the white sandy beach, staying in the shade of the palm trees. They came across an ice cream stand, Carla picking out an orange flavoured popsicle while Turk went for a large ice cream sandwich. By the time they had got to the pier Turk had devoured his frozen treat and decided to pick up another on the way back, much to Carla's bemusement. She decided not to say anything. They were on vacation after all.

After another few hours on the beach, Turk's stomach was growling and even Carla was feeling a little peckish. They decide to head back to the resort for a snack before dinner. As they walked hand in hand along a rough path, they noticed a gathering of people over by a small beach restaurant. They wandered over saw a large, handmade sign hanging from pole, in front of about six rows of chairs facing towards a raised table.

"The Suva Stuff-off." Carla read. "Daily eating contests with fabulous CASH prizes. Half-price entry for honeymooners." She snorted, turning to Turk, "What kind of person would do that on their honeymoon?"

To her surprise he wasn't there, and she looked around with a groan to see him shaking hands with a heavy-set native and handing him some money. She hurried over as Turk headed for the stage.

"Turk, what are you doing?" she demanded.

Turk looked surprised. "Baby, it's all I can eat cheeseburgers for like, five bucks, plus if I win I get a prize."

"But we're on an all-expenses paid trip, so you could have just..." Carla's logic was interrupted by the announcement for all competitors to take the stage.

"Wish me luck?" Turk asked.

Carla sighed and smiled "Go get them papi."

As he went to take his place, Carla went to sit in the second row, feeling embarrassed as the rest of the seats filled with spectators.

Turk meanwhile sat on his stool in front of the table, going through his game plan. He was eager to win, as well as stuff his face. As the restaurant owner went through the rules, Turk checked out his competition. There were four other entrants, most of them pretty heavy. Two big Fijian guys sat next to each other, chatting in their language, while on the other side of them a stout Australian was soaking up the support from his friends in the crowd. Sitting next to him was the only female competitor, a chubby blonde from Germany, who Turk thought looked kind of like Elliot, if Elliot put on about a hundred pounds. She was wearing a pretty skimpy bikini for a woman her size, showing off a lot of pale white cleavage. She noticed him looking and he blushed and turned away, murmuring 'good luck'.

As two women brought out three massive platters of cheese burgers, Turk looked for Carla in the crowd and waved. She waved half-heartedly.

Before Turk knew it, the announcer yelled go, and suddenly every person in the crowd was yelling and cheering as the competitors set to it. Turk reached for a burger and had it snatched from under him by the German, throwing him off pace. He quickly grabbed another and dug in, taking a massive bite of the burger, cheese and grease and meat filling his cheeks as he chewed and swallowed quickly. He shoved it down in three bites and reached for another, seeing the other competitors were already on their third. He had to catch up.

***

Seven and a half burgers later and Turk was feeling the strain. The Australian had already dropped out after almost choking to death on a pickle, leaving only four left. Turk's stomach was incredibly swollen, his face covered in a mixture of ketchup and cheese. He could feel the solid mass of food pushing his belly out, his swimsuit cutting into him. He hurriedly adjusted himself, and found a little extra room to finish off his ninth burger and reach for a tenth. As he did so he saw one of the Fijians collapse off his chair, and knew it was down to three of them. The other Fijian was like a wild animal, cramming them down as fast as he could, whereas the German was more efficient, eating each burger with a minimum of fuss. Turk was a burger of the pace, but as he crammed down another bite, he knew he could win this.

***

"Third." Carla said disparagingly, "You make an absolute pig of yourself in front of the entire resort and you can only manage third?"

Turk groaned and belched, walking as Carla supported him under one arm. He had just been moving on to his eleventh burger when he suddenly felt dizzy, and before he knew it he had fallen backwards and landed flat on the sand, his now huge stomach sticking up in the air like a blimp. As the crowd laughed and cheered, Carla hurried to help him up, her cheeks crimson with embarrassment. They had left quietly as the German woman celebrated her victory, twenty burgers to the Fijian's 19, by chugging a bottle of beer.

They were now on the path back to their room, Turk clutching his swollen stomach with both hands and moaning, his button up shirt flapping open, while Carla fumed. They finally arrived at their suite and Turk immediately collapsed on to the bed, letting out a sigh of relief. Carla crossed her arms and sighed. "You better get ready, we're going to dinner in forty minutes, and I want to walk around the lagoon first, and watch the sunset." She left to go have have a shower.

Turk groaned. He wanted nothing more than to lie in bed and have Carla rub his belly, not walk around some stupid lagoon. He could tell Carla was annoyed with him though, and if he knew if he wanted to have sex tonight he had better toe the line. Plus, he reasoned, the walk would help him build up an appetite for dinner. He belched and struggled to sit up, finding it almost impossible. He decided to give it another few minutes, and lay back, rubbing his belly and closing his eyes, the gentle lapping of the waves lulling him to sleep.
12122.title: Later that day an eating contest on the beach.....

choices: Turk decides to eat what he wants and hope Carla doesn't mind.
Turk reins in his appetite and goes home extremely hungry.
121222.content:
Turk dozed for 15 minutes until a freshly-showered Carla woke him, jabbing his turgid belly painfully. As she got dressed, he stumbled to the bathroom, shrugging off his button up before peeling off his overly snug swimsuit and letting it slap wetly against the tiled floor. He stepped under the the shower and immediately felt refreshed, the hot water streaming over his body and relieving the little aches and pains. He soaped up his swollen belly, massaging it in an attempt to aid the digestion off his massive meal. He rinsed off and stepped out of the cubicle, grabbing a fluffy white towel and drying off, then wrapped it around hips, underneath his gut.

He re-entered the bedroom and saw Carla was already dressed, and he was expecting her to be annoyed. but instead she was apologetic. She came up and gave him a hug, and a tender kiss on the lips, before cuddling against him.

"I'm sorry I was angry, Papi."

"Don't worry about it baby." He replied, glad to make peace, wrapping his arms around her.

They stood in this pleasant embrace for a few moments before Carls broke away and told Turk to get dressed.

***

They walked around the lagoon hand in hand, Carla wearing a mid-length dark pink dress with a light white jacket against the evening chill. Turk got his canvas shorts on with little trouble, and his dark blue shirt was baggy enough to hide most of his belly while he was sitting, though it bulged out when he stood up. They kissed as the last rays of sun dipped down beneath the horizon, the previous anger forgotten, and tranquility restored. Until they arrived at the restaurant.

Much like the previous one, this restaurant catered towards couples, each table being secluded in it's own gazebo, each with breathtaking views of the ocean and the vast field of stars glittering above it. Turk and Carla sat, holding hands across the table and admiring the view, until they were tactfully interrupted by a waitress proffering menus.

After ordering a beer for Turk and a white wine for herself, Carla, who hadn't eaten since the ice-cream stand, began perusing the menu hungrily. Turk also glanced at the menu, and to his surprise he found he was a little hungry, despite the massive amount of food he had eaten not three hours ago. He rubbed a tentative hand over his stomach and found that, while it was still quite firm, it was not the rock hard lump it had been. Maybe he had enough room for some of the rotisserie chicken, or half a lobster. Actually, he thought, feeling his mouth starting to water, maybe a whole lobster, or even the t-bone steak.

On the other, Carla had been pretty annoyed with him for pigging out earlier, and they had only just made up. If he wanted to have sex tonight, he would probably have to stick to a small dinner, maybe even just a salad.

And yet he was suddenly filled with the urge to stuff himself once again. The waitress arrived, and after Carla ordered the seafood medley, turned to Turk, pencil poised expectantly.

Turk hesitated, glancing at Carla before making a final decision.
121222.title: Turk gets up and goes to dinner, and pigs out a...

choices: Turk wakes up to Carla standing over him.
Turk wakes up and manages to get back to bed.
1212222.content:
"Um... Just the salad for me thanks." He handed back the menu as the waitress commended him on his excellent choice.

As hungry as he was suddenly feeling, Turk knew better than to push his luck when Carla was in one of her moods. From the way she was smiling and stroking his hand, he was sure he had made the right choice.

As they waited for their food, Turk ate as much bread as he thought he could get away with, with plenty of butter and olive oil. He was hoping the salad would be substantial enough, but his heart dropped and his stomach growled when he saw it was little more than a few leaves of lettuce and a handful of tomato, with no more than a drizzle of dressing.

He munched his way through his salad stoically, watching jealously as Carla packed away two and a half plates of the delicious seafood medley. She had missed lunch thanks to Turk, and hungrily filled her stomach. Finally she put down her fork and patted her stomach. "Whoof," she sighed, "I think we can skip dessert, huh?"

Turk felt like he could have eaten the entire dessert menu twice over, but Carla was already getting up to leave before he could say a word of protest.

***

Turk woke up to the sound of his stomach rumbling. A quick glance at the bedside clock told him it was only half one in the morning. They had gotten back to their room after dinner and quickly got down to business. Turk forgot about his hunger as soon as Carla slipped out of her dress, revealing that she was wearing nothing underneath. After an hour and a half they had both collapsed with exhaustion, quickly snuggling up and falling asleep.

Now, however, Turk doubted he could sleep through the sounds his stomach was making. Carefully removing Carla's arm from around his waist, he sat up and got out of bed, sneaking out of the bedroom to the living area. After scrabbling around for the light switch and letting his eyes adjust to the glare, Turk quickly located the phone. He picked it up and pressed 1.

"Room Service, how may I help you?"

"Uh, yeah, could I order some food for suite 23." Turk whispered, flipping through the laminated menu next to the phone.

"Yes sir, what would you like?"

"Um, could I get, uh, two shrimp cocktails, a platter of French fries, and the, uh, Surf and Turf? With, extra Turf. Well done."

"That shouldn't be a problem sir, anything for dessert?"

"Um..."

"May I recommend the chocolate fudge cake?"

"Yeah, yeah. sounds good." Turk panted, mouth already watering.

He hung up and, realizing he had better put something on before the food arrived, and grabbed a toweling robe from the bathroom. He muted the TV, turned on ESPN and waited impatiently, trying to distract himself from his hunger with a college basketball highlight reel.

The knock on the door, when it came, was quiet enough, but in the quietness of the night sounded like someone was trying to break in. Turk froze and listened for sounds of Carla stirring, but a gentle snoring reassured him she was still asleep. He crept to the door and opened it, a finger to his lips. The bellhop nodded, gently pushing the laden cart through the door. He handed Turk the bill, and after giving a generous tip and signing his name he practically threw it back at him and bundled him out the door.

Finally alone, Turk wheeled the cart over to the couch and grabbed the first shrimp cocktail. It was supposed to serve 2 people, so there was plenty of delicious juicy shrimp and tangy sauce. Turk devoured each shrimp in one bite, sauce dribbling down his chin. Wiping his mouth on the sleeve of his bathrobe, he reached for the second one, eating this one slightly slower than the first, savoring the delicious flavor of the tiny crustaceans. Still chewing the last of the cocktail, Turk lifted the cloches off of the two large plates on the cart, revealing a veritable mountain of french fries and an almost equally large helping of Surf and Turf. It seemed they had given him extra Surf as well. He grabbed and handful of fries, dipped them in the remains of the cocktail sauce and crammed them in his mouth, while his other hand picked up the melted butter boat and poured a liberal helping over the lobster and steak alike. Taking a fork in one hand, Turk ate like a man possessed, making sure his mouth was always full of food. His cheeks bulged, his jaw ached from chewing, his hands and chin were covered in a sheen of grease and butter. His stomach was slowly expanding outwards and he packed it with more and more choice food, getting larger and larger and pushing against the downy softness of his robe.

By the time he had crunched down the last of the fries and licked the last of the butter from his fingers, Turk's stomach was about the size it had been after the eating contest. He lay back and suppressed a belch, still conscious of Carla in the other room. He undid his robe for better access and begin massaging his swollen stomach, letting out grunts and groans of satisfaction. This had been exactly what he needed. Gazing at the ruin of stained plates and soiled napkins all over the cart, he noticed another, smaller cloche on the lower tier. His dessert!

Letting out a series of small burps, Turk leaned forward and lifted up the dish, placing it on the couch next to him. Sure, he was pretty full, but a single slice of chocolate cake couldn't hurt, could it? Removing the cover, he was surprised to find not a single slice but an entire small cake, luxuriously iced and decorated with smooth milk chocolate. Even as he rubbed his rock hard gut, he reckoned he could hear it gurgle in anticipation.

"Just... just one slice." he told himself, picking up a knife and licking his lips. One rather small slice turned into two rather small slices, followed by a slightly larger slice. Two slices later and he was halfway through, so he decided he might as well finish it off. After laboriously cutting and consuming another two slices, Turk simply picked up the final third of cake and finished every last crumb of it. His belly was now larger than it had ever been before, and tight as a drum. The sensation gave Turk a wonderful warm feeling, and he felt that if Carla woke up and caught him right now, face stained with chocolate, stomach the size of a basketball, he wouldn't even care.

Letting out a last large belch and patting his stomach, he fell back into a deep, contented sleep.
1212222.title: Turk reins in his appetite and goes home extrem...

choices: ...stopping would be harder than he thought.
...Carla knew, and was already planning his punishment.
12122222.content:
When he woke up, Turk's perspective had returned and he realized just how annoyed Carla would be if she found him lying on the couch in a stained bathrobe, stomach bulging with food, surrounded by the evidence of his gluttony. Dawn was just beginning to break as he got up as rapidly as his still bloated stomach would allow him. He quietly tidied up, placing the plates and cloches back on the cart and cautiously opening the door. He wheeled the cart as far down the hallway as he could, praying it would be removed before he and Carla went down for breakfast. Just before he left he realized he would have to get rid of the robe, as it was covered in chocolate stains and a mixture of butter and cocktail sauce. Looking around, he slipped it off and rapidly padded back to his room in the nude, clutching his belly to stop it bouncing uncomfortably. After a brief stop in the bathroom to clean his face and hands, Turk crept back into the bedroom. Carla was still asleep, thankfully, lying on her front, butt stuck in the air, snoring softly. She was normally a light sleeper, but all the wine at dinner must have had an effect.

Turk lay down as quietly as he could, awkward with his protruding gut, but he managed. Safely back in bed and completely satiated, with Carla none the wiser, Turk had no trouble drifting off to sleep for the third time that night.

***

Sunlight streaming through the window pricked at Turk's eyelids, causing him to wake with a yawn. He quickly got up and made for the bathroom. As he washed his hands, he saw that his stomach had gone down quite a bit, hopefully enough for Carla not to have noticed. As he walked back into the bedroom, he saw that his wife wasn't wear he had left her, the bed being empty. His heart beat faster. Had she noticed? Did she know? Where could she be?

The bedroom door opened, and Turk relaxed as Carla walked in wearing the other white fluffy bathrobe. Judging by the smile on her face, she was still in the dark about his late night binge.

"Good morning Papi." She smiled, giving him a kiss and rubbing up against him.

Turk grinned and kissed her back. "Good morning Mrs. Turk."

"I've got a surprise for you..." she whispered in his ear, taking his hand and leading him out of the bedroom.

Turk followed her to the living area. He almost fainted when he saw the cart was back where he had left it. But wait, this was a different cart. A cart filled with pancakes, bacon, eggs, and sausages, as well as jugs of O.J and coffee. There were also racks of toast and bagels, with jams and butter, and a box of donuts.

As Turk stared, Carla explained. "I figured you might have gotten your appetite back after last night. I might have ordered a little too much..."

Despite himself, Turk was already considering what to eat first. But if Carla was here, he would have to hold back, as hard as that might be.

"Now I already ate," Carla said, pointing to a small plate with a few crumbs on it, "So I'm going to have a shower and get ready for the beach. The bellhop said to just push it out into the hall when you're finished."

She gave Turk another peck on the cheek and headed back into the bedroom. Turk quickly began pigging out, not even bothering to remove the food from the serving trays. He couldn't believe Carla hadn't caught him out, but she'd notice pretty quickly if he kept eating like this.

"Just this last time, then I'll stop." Turk told himself as he shoveled down the scrambled eggs.

Little did he know...

155.title: Writer's Choice

info.brief_description: A story for the men of Sacred Heart Hospital to start filling out their scrubs.
info.description:
The boys of Sacred Heart Hospital are filling up. The male doctors have noticed something is changing at their hospital...their quickly expanding waistlines!

The characters are any of the male characters in the t.v. show.

John "J.D." Dorian - Mid 20's. He has a very lean body type. His best friend is Turk. He loves his occasional appletinni. Is in love with Elliot Reed, another doctor at the hospital. Also, he has a child with Kim, but they are not together. He is a very sensitive man. Has an older brother named Dan.

Chris Turk - A surgeon at the hospital. Is also in his mid 20's. The best friend to JD. He has a heftier build and is sporting a softening, but not flabby belly. He is married to Carla and has a little girl named Isabella. He is VERY competitive. Has an older brother named Kevin.

The Janitor - Late 20's/Early 30's. Very tall and lanky. He is a prankster and has it out for JD. Not much is known about his personal life.

Bob Kelso - Early 60's. Stocky build with a good size belly. Chief of medicine for the hospital who has recently retired. He is a stickler for the rules, but has a soft heart (that you seldom see). He is married to Enid, but cheats on her a lot.

Dr. Cox - Late 30's/Early 40's. He is lean and fairly in shape. He is the sarcastic and narcissistic, with a cruel wit. He is also very concerned about the way he is perceived in the hospital, often making very illogical and self-destructive decisions in order to keep his bad boy image. He is divorced from Jordan Sullivan, but they retain an exclusive relationship. They have two children Jack and Jennifer.

The Todd - Mid 20's. He is fairly thin but has a softened belly. He is a surgeon at Sacred Heart Hospital and is commonly seen sporting speedos (or banana hammocks) and insists that anyone sleeping over at his apartment has to hammock up. The Todd's excessive boorishness towards women is over-compensation for homosexuality.

Ted - Mid 40's. He is thin but has a starter belly. He is the Lawyer at Sacred Heart. Ted is pushed around and insulted by most of the hospital's staff, especially Dr Kelso, who goes out of his way to make Ted's life difficult, and Dr Cox, both of whom know Ted hates them but also know he does not have the courage to do anything about it. Was once married but his wife left him.

Sean Kelly - Mid 20's. Average stature. He is one of Elliot's boyfriends. Works at Sea World with the whales and dolphins.

These are just a few of the characters feel free to add in any of the other characters from the show.

Just have fun and add as much or as little as you want. You can make it realistic or fantastical, your choice.
